alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Johnson; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Carter; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe; Unicoi (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 7:33PM CST until December 19 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM MONDAY TO 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected tonight with trace amounts of snow and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Snow expected mainly Monday afternoon and evening. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches possible above 3,000 feet and 4 to 6 inches above 5,000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches above 2,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Mountains of east Tennessee. * WHEN...From 3 AM Monday to 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Blowing snow may result in reduced visibility and very dangerous driving conditions. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
